headline: ZeroPoint Technologies Teams with OCP Composable Memory Systems TCO Sub-Team Member to Showcase Inline Hardware Memory Compression
summary: This week, at the OCP Global Summit in San Jose, California, ZeroPoint Technologies and Seagate Technology LLC, a global, mass capacity data storage leader, will unveil a real-time demonstration showcasing the power of hardware-accelerated memory compression within a CXL memory tier. The demonstration falls under the two companies' work as part of the Open Compute Project's (OCP) Composable Memory Systems (CMS) TCO Sub-Team initiative and utilizes representative workloads to validate the signifi

headline: Western Digital and Seagate Remain Buys Even as Stocks on Remarkable Runs, Citi Says
summary: Wall Street continues to boost its outlook for data-storage companies like  Western Digital  and  Seagate Technology Holdings  amid a surge in demand for cloud computing and artificial intelligence.  Citi  reiterated Buy ratings for both stocks, as well as competitor  Sandisk  in a research note Monday.  The firm lifted its price target for  Western Digital  to $135 from $110; for  Seagate  to $250 from $215; and for  Sandisk  to $150 from $125.
